high_descs: Turn to the left
Head to the dresser
Take the blue bank card from the dresser
Turn on the lamp
anns.task_desc: Pick up the blue bank card, turn on the lamp

high_descs: Turn left and head towards the green lamp on the dresser.
Pick up the credit card near the lamp.
Look towards the lamp on the dresser.
Turn on the lamp on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Examine a credit card next to the light of the desk lamp.

high_descs: Go left and turn to face the end of the dresser near the lamp.
Pick the credit card up from the dresser.
Lift the credit card up towards the lamp.
Turn the lamp on.
anns.task_desc: Hold a credit card near a lamp that is also turned on.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the left side of the table behind you.
Pick up the credit card.
Look up at the lamp.
Turn on the lamp.
Turn left and walk to the dresser.
Pick up the credit card.
Look at the lamp.
Turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Look at a credit card illuminated by a lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and walk over to the dresser
Pick up the credit card from the dresser
Look up at the lamp
Turn on the lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine the credit card by the light of the table lamp
